known_issues: Quick add demographics is not extracting patient information (patient info not being pulled/populated).

existing_features.title: Fix the Quick Add Demographics paste handler so demographics extraction reliably runs on pasted content and correctly populates the CaseForm fields.
Improve the demographics extraction rules to better match common real-world pasted demographics formats so that patient information is extracted more consistently.
Add clear user-facing feedback when no usable demographics can be extracted from the pasted text.
